name: Cookie Crumb Chocolate Covered Strawberry
author: FoodWasteAced
summary: Our version of a yummy chocolate covered strawberry! Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 cup crushed chocolate covered mint cookies (such as Girl Scouts Thin Mints®)
directions: Melt chocolate and oil together in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching
Place crushed cookies in a shallow bowl
Dip strawberries into the melted chocolate
Press coated strawberry in the crushed cookies until completely covered
Place covered strawberries on a plate and refrigerate until chocolate is set, at least 15 minutes
